directions: Mash cheese and thyme together in a small ovenproof dish, and bake at 325ÂºF for 15 to 20 minutes until golden brown.
Remove the dish from the oven and drizzle with olive oil. Serve with sliced baguette or crackers.
ingredients: 8 to 12 ounces marinated goat cheese or feta, broken into large chunks
4 to 5 sprigs fresh thyme (or 1 teaspoon dried thyme)
Sliced baguette or crackers, for servin
title: Baked Goat Cheese
